summary: This is an email forwarding a courtesy copy of an ECF filing in the case U.S. v. Maxwell (S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)). It is sent by defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim to recipients including Christian Everdell and Laura Menninger, and includes a note about Sternheim's new office address and contact information.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: Attorney representing Ghislaine Maxwell in the case U.S. v. Maxwell; sends the email forwarding a court filing and provides updated contact information.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Recipient of the email, copied on the correspondence regarding the Maxwell case filing.

persons.context: Recipient of the email, copied on the correspondence regarding the Maxwell case filing.

persons.name: Jeff Pagliuca

events.title: ECF Filing in U.S. v. Maxwell
events.description: A court filing is made in the case U.S. v. Maxwell (S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)), and a courtesy copy is forwarded via email by defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated November 3, 2021, related to the criminal case U.S. v. Maxwell (S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)).
Defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim is sending a courtesy copy of an ECF filing to other attorneys, including Christian Everdell and Laura Menninger.
Sternheim provides updated contact information, indicating a change in her office address and preferred email.
The email includes a confidentiality notice, typical of legal correspondence.
